title: #359: Did Shapeshifting Jesus Battle The Archons For Control Of The Simulation with Miguel Connor
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Aeon Byte's Miguel Connor to discuss the Gnostics belief that Jesus was a shapeshifter sent to battle the Archons for control of this simulation. So join us for one of our craziest episode yet as the whole crew has a come to Jesus moment. Thank you so much for your support.

Come see Sam Tripoli live:
Los Angeles California:
Sept 5th
Tin Foil Hat's "Mother Of All Truth Bombs" Live Podcast at the World Famous Comedy at 8pm. Watch the live stream at Youtube.com/SamTripoli

Appleton Wisconsin
Sept 10th-12th
https://www.skylinecomedy.com
